thread.title: Black Twitter Reacts To Yahoo's "N****r Navy" Tweet
thread.title_full: Black Twitter Reacts To Yahoo's "N****r Navy" Tweet

author: Angus Walker
title: Black Twitter Reacts To Yahoo's "N****r Navy" Tweet
text:
Home > Viral > Black Twitter Reacts To Yahoo's "N****r Navy" Tweet Black Twitter Reacts To Yahoo's "N****r Navy" Tweet 0 0 Posted by Angus Walker , Jan 6, 2017 at 11:29am A disastrous typo led to a legendary party that was exclusive to Black Twitter. 
Last night, one erroneous keystroke sent Twitter, and specifically Black Twitter -- aka the Best Twitter, into a frenzy, producing countless top-quality memes. Strangely enough, the tweet that started it all came from the account of Yahoo Finance. "Trump wants a much bigger navy. Here's how much it'll cost." That was the INTENDED headline. The damning typo in question inadvertently caused "bigger" to rhyme with another word, one that happens to be a well-known racial slur. 
After being live for 20 minutes -- well past the time needed for lasting virality -- Yahoo Finance deleted the tweet and quickly tweeted out an apology, making note of the "spelling error." But they had already created a trending topic -- one in which white people could not participate: #N*ggerNavy (with no asterisk). Leave it up to Black Twitter to take an accidental racial slur and turn it into the funniest series of memes Twitter has seen in a long while. Read some of the choice responses to Yahoo's outrageous typo below. We deleted an earlier tweet due to a spelling error. We apologize for the mistake. — Yahoo Finance (@YahooFinance) January 6, 2017 The 'B' on the keyboard of the Yahoo Finance headline writer: Just press me and hit send on this story.The 'N' on the keyboard: pic.twitter.com/yYFnCJLtY1 — Jemele Hill (@jemelehill) January 6, 2017 Move over Rihanna Navy, Yahoo's got the n*gger Navy...I mean bigger navy: https://t.co/jbhyDLKZfP — Yamaneika Saunders (@yamaneika) January 6, 2017 IM SICK OF YALL pic.twitter.com/gb5bH7YTOz — Jay Dior (@JayKenMinaj) January 6, 2017 I like how they allowed "Black Twitter" and "Yahoo Finance" into the trending topics but left it up to you to make the connection — J.A. Adande (@jadande) January 6, 2017 Yahoo!'s social media manager at the meeting tomorrow: pic.twitter.com/8OrYznBlFb — Czar Pharaoh Khan (@3CarryOnItems) January 6, 2017 #niggernavy "They're sending me to Korea"Black Moms: Well until I get Korea parents number you ain't going nowhere — Real Boy (@PharaohSpacely) January 6, 2017 Russia : We hacked yo fucking electionObama: Bet. #NiggerNavy pulling up with the Draco pic.twitter.com/w0EnD4ycXn — Big Homie Abdi (@bighomieabdi) January 6, 2017 Yahoo Finance's social media correspondent tomorrow at work pic.twitter.com/Zu0PaG1Adx — Mitch Broyles (@broylesmb) January 6, 2017 me and the white community reading these yahoo finance tweets but not being able to RT or participate in the jokes pic.twitter.com/i8gPC7Oa6T — USS No Pull Out (@koopa_kinte) January 6, 2017 "Black twitter" turned #NiggerNavy into a joke. We turned racism into laughter and smiles. You know...what we been doing for centuries...? https://t.co/Ia7Wan5kSq — ⚯͛Dirty Bird Germ△⃒⃘ (@DrDreddyMurphy) January 6, 2017 Is we in the ocean or is we in the water #NiggerNavy pic.twitter.com/Vjv61c2UhZ — THEE Barry S. Naylor (@BSNComedy) January 6, 2017 When it's wake up on the USS Lemon Pepper #NiggerNavy pic.twitter.com/bcDkyJ7dNV — Dom Izzo (@DOM_iZZO) January 6, 2017 Trump: We gotta go to war Captain: You got gas money? #niggernavy — black history heaux (@localblactivist) January 6, 2017 General: OFFSET!! — Loc 1000 (@Ju_Loc) January 6, 2017 #NiggerNavy most definitely sailing over the Specific Ocean — James Wonder (@MichaelHJordan) January 6, 2017 #NiggerNavy telling their grandkids about their war stories pic.twitter.com/4FZI1Z7Dew — Pinot Grigihoe (@mombxtch) January 6, 2017 Captain Quavo: "y'all seen land yet?"Admiral Offset: "yea... DAT WAY" #NiggerNavy pic.twitter.com/5sOa2plZ1O — Moneybags McBeard (@JVMES_BVTTLE) January 6, 2017 When the dj played swag surf on the nigger Navy ship pic.twitter.com/CpwdVN7fyv — Finish the fight (@SirToonday) January 6, 2017 Every time the #NiggerNavy sinks a battleship, someone yells Worldstar < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Jan 6, 2017 at 11:29am 1 View
